message: Bob, I propose a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases for me each round, so a fair agreement now is better than a potentially better offer later.
Alice, I'm willing to offer a 55/45 split in my favor.  While the money is losing value for both of us, I'm taking the risk that you might prefer to play another round and end up with less.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.  The longer we wait, the less valuable the money becomes for me.
